head.title: Chorus Room/Notes for Information Providers Part 2

html.body:
This page uses ISO-8859-1 characters.
When you read this page, set Document Encoding into Western (Latin-1). At Netscape, this option can be set from the "Document Encoding" menu, in the "Options" menu.
à ... [`a]
á ... ['a]
â ... [^a]
ã ... [~a]
ä ... ["a]
å ...[.a]
ç ... [,c]
æ ... [ae]
ß ... [ss]
and so on.
KUNISHIMA Takeo<&kunishi-email;>
$Revision: 1.10 $ $Date: 2000/08/29 10:08:51 $ GMT
